text: The numerically largest group, consisting of male weekly wage-earners up to charge-hand level and in the works only, excluding the offices, was therefore selected. A detailed age-structure was compiled from personnel department records, revealing three aged sixty-four years, and sixty-five just fifty years of age.
handwritten_text: The numerically largest group, consisting of male weekly wage-earners up to charge-hand level and in the works only, excluding the offices, was therefore selected. A detailed age-structure was compiled from personnel department records, revealing three aged sixty-four years, and sixty-five just fifty years of age.
